tooltip.vrm:death1: Attack have a chance to life steal
tooltip.vrm:death2: [Right-Click] Mark surrounding targets, dealing more damage
tooltip.vrm:death3: [Shift Right-Click] Apply voodoo(all damage will be transferred to target) onto target
tooltip.vrm:death4: [On Hold] Revival on death & dealing target's half max hp as damage to target
tooltip.vrm:war1: Attack have a chance to ignite target
tooltip.vrm:war2: [Right-Click] Gain temporary strength and resistance, additional effect when low on health
tooltip.vrm:war3: [Shift Right-Click] Inflict rage and cause near-by mobs to fight each other
tooltip.vrm:war4: [On Hold] Gain resistance and strength on low health
tooltip.vrm:pes1: Shoot Magical Arrow which causes Plague (will release toxin when target dies)
tooltip.vrm:pes3: [Crouching Shoot] Shoots 3 Magical Arrows but with poor accuracy
tooltip.vrm:pes4: [On Hold] Immune to all Negative potion effects
tooltip.vrm:fam1: Absorbs nearby life force to fill hunger [if holding, absorbs from creatures]
tooltip.vrm:fam2: [On Hold] Make nearby animals crave for lust
tooltip.vrm:fam3: [On Hold] When attacked, have a chance to apply daze onto attacker
tooltip.vrm:fam4: [Shift Right-Click] Sacrifice all hunger for full health
